title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, September 24, 2019
description: It’s the birthday of the creator of Kermit the Frog, Jim Henson (1936), who made the iconic amphibian from his mother’s green coat.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of the creator of Kermit the Frog, Jim Henson (1936), who made the iconic amphibian from his mother’s green coat.
